description.name: Heat Shrink Tubing Kit Color 328pcs
description.long_desc:
Cześć, jestem Copilot, twoim towarzyszem AI. Zapytałeś mnie o tłumaczenie HTML na angielski. Oto moja propozycja:

Heat shrink tubes are made of polyethylene. The set contains 328 pieces. They perfectly insulate and seal. They create a protective, anticorrosive and decorative layer. They protect the service pipe from atmospheric and underground corrosion. They have high resistance to variable weather conditions. They protect against moisture. They take the shape of the object on which they are shrunk and increase its mechanical protection. Just connect the wires, put on the sleeve and heat it with a lighter or a heat gun. After this operation, the sleeve will shrink by up to half of its volume.

The set contains 328 pieces:

  • 120 pieces x 1.0 x 40 mm (yellow, black, red, green)
  • 60 pieces x 2.0 x 40 mm (yellow, black, red, blue)
  • 40 pieces x 3.0 x 40 mm (yellow, black, red, green)
  • 32 pieces x 4.0 x 40 mm (yellow, black, red, blue)
  • 24 pieces x 6.0 x 40 mm (yellow, black, red, green)
  • 20 pieces x 8.0 x 80 mm (yellow, black, red, blue)
  • 16 pieces x 10.0 x 80 mm (yellow, black, red, green)
  • 16 pieces x 14.0 x 80 mm (yellow, black, red, blue)

Product characteristics:

  • They perfectly insulate and seal.
  • They create a protective, anticorrosive and decorative layer.
  • They protect the service pipe from atmospheric and underground corrosion.
  • They have high resistance to variable weather conditions.
  • They protect against moisture.
  • They take the shape of the object on which they are shrunk and increase its mechanical protection.

description.name: Foam Angled Sanding Block 125x90x25mm P40
description.long_desc:
Beveled abrasive block with dimensions of 125x90x25 mm and grit P40 is an indispensable tool for working on wooden, metal, or composite surfaces. Thanks to its precise construction and high-quality materials, our abrasive block guarantees efficient and uniform sanding.


Main product features:



  • Beveled abrasive block

  • Dimensions: 125x90x25 mm

  • Grit: P40

  • Excellent for sanding wood, metal, composites

  • Precise and uniform sanding


Grit P40 makes the block excellent for removing larger irregularities, making it perfect for preparing surfaces for subsequent processing stages. The ergonomic shape of the block facilitates manipulation and precise handling during work.

  • Dimensions: 125x90x25 mm

  • Grit: P40

  • Excellent for sanding wood, metal, composites

  • Precise and uniform sanding


Grit P40 makes the block excellent for removing larger irregularities, making it perfect for preparing surfaces for subsequent processing stages. The ergonomic shape of the block facilitates manipulation and precise handling during work.

description.name: Foam Angled Sanding Block 125x90x25mm P100
description.long_desc:
Beveled abrasive block with dimensions of 125x90x25 mm and grit P100 is an indispensable tool for working on wooden, metal, composite, and gypsum surfaces. Thanks to its precise construction and high-quality materials, our abrasive block guarantees efficient and uniform sanding.


Main product features:



  • Beveled abrasive block

  • Dimensions: 125x90x25 mm

  • Grit: P100

  • Excellent for sanding wood, metal, composites

  • Precise and uniform sanding


Grit P100 makes the block excellent for smoothing surfaces, providing simultaneously even and smooth finishing. Its ergonomic shape facilitates handling and precise guidance during work, increasing the efficiency of sanding.

description.name: Foam Sanding Block 70x100x25mm P220
description.long_desc:
Main product features:



  • Set of 10 sanding blocks

  • Grit: P220

  • Excellent for precise sanding and smoothing

  • Suitable for finishing work

  • High-quality craftsmanship


Intended use:



  • for plaster

  • for glass

  • for plastic

  • for paint

  • for wood

  • for metal


Grit P220 is an ideal solution for delicate sanding, removing fine burrs, and achieving smooth surfaces. Each sanding block in the set is carefully crafted, ensuring durability and effectiveness during various applications.

description.name: Grinding Stone Set 10pcs
description.long_desc:
Set of grinding stones from Geko, 10 pieces, various types. Each stone in the set is characterized by high-quality craftsmanship, enabling precise and efficient grinding.


Set contents:



  • Conical stone white 22 mm

  • Spherical stone white 22 mm

  • Spherical stone white 10 mm

  • Cylindrical stone gray 22 mm

  • Cylindrical stone gray 10 mm

  • Cylinder-cone stone gray 16 mm

  • Conical stone gray 10 mm

  • Cylinder-cone stone pink 13 mm

  • Conical stone pink 10 mm

  • Cylinder-cone stone pink 8 mm


Technical data:



  • Shank size: 5x6mm, 5x3mm

  • Quantity: 10 pieces

  • Max rpm: 21000

description.name: Waterproof sandpaper – sheet 230x280mm P400
description.long_desc:
Waterproof sandpaper sheet with dimensions 230x280mm and grit P400 designed to deliver excellent results in processing various surfaces both dry and wet.


Technical specifications:



  • Grit: P400

  • Dimensions: 230x280mm

  • Sandpaper with resin bond

  • Elastic silicone paper

  • The paper self-dries after wet processing


Application:



  • Sanding paint,

  • Sanding varnishes,

  • Sanding putties,

  • Sanding metals,

  • Sanding plastics and other materials.


All the above-mentioned applications can be performed both dry and wet.

description.name: Aluminium Oxide Abrasive Yellow Disc for Giraffe Sander 225mm Grit 40
description.long_desc:
Wyjątkowo trwały dysk o średnicy 225mm i gradacji P40 z dzirukami do odprowadzania pyłu szlifowanego materiału. Papier nadaje się do szlifowania różnych powierzchni.


Mocny rzep zapewnia trzymanie nawet przy długim użytkowaniu.


Specyfikacja techniczna:



  • Średnica papieru: 225mm

  • Gradacja: P40

  • Ilość w opakowaniu: 10 szt.

  • Rodzaj: papier ścierny z dziurkami do szlifierki oscylacyjne i/lub szlifierki do gipsu "żyrafy"

  • Równomierne rozłożenie ziarna zapewniające szybkie i wydajne szlifowanie


Przeznaczenie:



  • Szlifowanie drewna

  • Szlifowanie gipsu
description.short_desc:

description.name: Aluminium Oxide Abrasive Yellow Disc for Giraffe Sander 225mm Grit 60
description.long_desc:
An exceptionally durable disc with a diameter of 225mm and grit P60 with perforations for dust extraction during sanding. The paper is suitable for sanding various surfaces.


The strong hook and loop fastening ensure secure attachment even during prolonged use.


Technical specifications:



  • Disc diameter: 225mm

  • Grit: P60

  • Quantity in the package: 10 pieces

  • Type: abrasive paper with perforations for oscillating sanders and/or "giraffe" drywall sanders

  • Uniform grain distribution for fast and efficient sanding


Application:



  • Sanding wood

  • Sanding drywall
description.short_desc:

description.short_desc:
An exceptionally durable disc with a diameter of 225mm and grit P80 with perforations for dust extraction during sanding. The paper is suitable for sanding various surfaces.


The strong hook and loop fastening ensure secure attachment even during prolonged use.


Technical specifications:



  • Disc diameter: 225mm

  • Grit: P80

  • Quantity in the package: 10 pieces

  • Type: abrasive paper with perforations for oscillating sanders and/or "giraffe" drywall sanders

  • Uniform grain distribution for fast and efficient sanding


Application:



  • Sanding wood

  • Sanding drywall
